problem.markdown:
1. Each counter consists of __________ and is known as __________ . ( ) Two 16- bit words and counter elements ( ) Four 16- bits words and counter elements (x) Three 16- bit words and counter elements ( ) Three 8-bit byte and counter elements
2. The current count of the counter is called as _________ . (x) Accumulated value ( ) Preset value 3. In counter element, the word zero is for _________ . ( ) Preset value ( ) None ( ) Accumulated value (x) Status bit
4. In default counter file, how to address the counter’s 12 accumulated value? ( ) C5:ACC/12 ( ) C5:12.ACC (x) C5:12/ACC ( ) C5:12-ACC 5. In counter element, the word two is for _______ ( ) Preset value (x) Accumulated value ( ) Status bit ( ) None
problem.p: 1. Each counter consists of __________ and is known as __________ .

choicegroup.choice: Two 16- bit words and counter elements
Four 16- bits words and counter elements
Three 16- bit words and counter elements

problem.p: 2. The current count of the counter is called as _________ .
3. In counter element, the word zero is for _________ .
4. In default counter file, how to address the counter’s 12 accumulated value?
5. In counter element, the word two is for _______
